entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
